verses.text: \w Fret|strong="H2734"\w* not thyself because of \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w*, neither be thou \w envious|strong="H7065"\w* against the \w workers|strong="H6213"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*.

For they shall \w soon|strong="H4120"\w* be cut \w down|strong="H5243"\w* like the \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*, and \w wither|strong="H5034"\w* as the \w green|strong="H3418"\w* \w herb|strong="H1877"\w*.

\w Trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \add so\add* shalt thou \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w verily|strong="H0530"\w* thou shalt be \w fed|strong="H7462"\w*.\f + \fr 37.3 \ft verily: Heb. in truth, or, stableness\f*
\w Delight|strong="H6026"\w* thyself also in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w desires|strong="H4862"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Commit|strong="H1556"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* also in him; and he shall bring \add it\add* to \w pass|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 37.5 \ft Commit…: Heb. Roll thy way upon\f*
And he shall bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* as the \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, and thy \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* as the \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*.

\w Rest|strong="H1826"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and wait \w patiently|strong="H2342"\w* for him: \w fret|strong="H2734"\w* not thyself because of him who \w prospereth|strong="H6743"\w* in his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, because of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* who \w bringeth|strong="H6213"\w* wicked \w devices|strong="H4209"\w* to \w pass|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 37.7 \ft Rest in: Heb. Be silent to\f*

\w Cease|strong="H7503"\w* from \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*: \w fret|strong="H2734"\w* not thyself in any \w wise|strong="H0389"\w* to do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*.

For \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*: but those that \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, they shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

For yet a little \w while|strong="H4592"\w*, and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add shall\add* not \add be:\add* yea, thou shalt diligently \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and it \add shall\add* not \add be\add*.

But the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and shall \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* themselves in the \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w plotteth|strong="H2161"\w* against the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, and \w gnasheth|strong="H2786"\w* upon him with his \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*.\f + \fr 37.12 \ft plotteth: or, practiseth\f*
The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* shall \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* at him: for he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* that his \w day|strong="H3117"\w* is \w coming|strong="H0935"\w*.

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* have drawn \w out|strong="H6605"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and have \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* their \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, to cast \w down|strong="H5307"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, \add and\add* to \w slay|strong="H2873"\w* such as be of \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w conversation|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 37.14 \ft such…: Heb. the upright of way\f*
Their \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into their own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and their \w bows|strong="H7198"\w* shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*.

A \w little|strong="H4592"\w* that a righteous \w man|strong="H6662"\w* hath \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than the \w riches|strong="H1995"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

For the \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w upholdeth|strong="H5564"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H8549"\w*: and their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* shall be for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

They shall not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* in the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*: and in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w famine|strong="H7459"\w* they shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*.

But the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, and the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add shall be\add* as the \w fat|strong="H3368"\w* of \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*: they shall \w consume|strong="H3615"\w*; into \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* shall they consume \w away|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 37.20 \ft the fat: Heb. the preciousness\f*

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w borroweth|strong="H3867"\w*, and payeth not \w again|strong="H7999"\w*: but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* sheweth \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w*, and \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w*.

For \add such as be\add* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* of him shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and \add they that be\add* \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* of him shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

The \w steps|strong="H4703"\w* of a \add good\add* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* are \w ordered|strong="H3559"\w* by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and he \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* in his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 37.23 \ft ordered: or, established\f*

Though he \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, he shall not be utterly cast \w down|strong="H2904"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w upholdeth|strong="H5564"\w* \add him with\add* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

I have been \w young|strong="H5288"\w*, and \add now\add* am \w old|strong="H2204"\w*; yet have I not \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*, nor his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w begging|strong="H1245"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\add He is\add* \w ever|strong="H3117"\w* \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w*, and \w lendeth|strong="H3867"\w*; and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \add is\add* \w blessed|strong="H1293"\w*.\f + \fr 37.26 \ft ever: Heb. all the day\f*
\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* for \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w forsaketh|strong="H5800"\w* not his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*; they are \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: but the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.
The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* therein for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

The \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1897"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w talketh|strong="H1696"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

The \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; none of his \w steps|strong="H0838"\w* shall \w slide|strong="H4571"\w*.\f + \fr 37.31 \ft steps: or, goings\f*
The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w watcheth|strong="H6822"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, and \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* him.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will not \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* him in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, nor \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* him when he is \w judged|strong="H8199"\w*.

\w Wait|strong="H6960"\w* on the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and he shall \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* thee to \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: when the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* are cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* in great \w power|strong="H6184"\w*, and \w spreading|strong="H6168"\w* himself like a \w green|strong="H7488"\w* bay \w tree|strong="H0249"\w*.\f + \fr 37.35 \ft a green…: or, a green tree that groweth in his own soil\f*
Yet he passed \w away|strong="H5674"\w*, and, lo, he \add was\add* not: yea, I \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him, but he could not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w Mark|strong="H8104"\w* the \w perfect|strong="H8535"\w* \add man\add*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*: for the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of \add that\add* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

But the \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w* shall be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

But the \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add he is\add* their \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w help|strong="H5826"\w* them, and \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* them: he shall \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* them from the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them, because they \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in him.
